approval-flow-builtin.project-owner: The system defines the approval process and only needs the project Owner to approve it.
approval-flow-builtin.workspace-dba: The system defines the approval process and only needs DBA approval.
approval-flow-builtin.workspace-admin: The system defines the approval process and only needs Administrator approval.
approval-flow-builtin.project-owner-workspace-dba: The system defines the approval process, first the project Owner approves, then the DBA approves.
approval-flow-builtin.project-owner-workspace-dba-workspace-ad: The system defines the approval process, first the project Owner approves, then the DBA approves, and finally the Administrator approves.

presets.request-role-high: The risk for the request project owner role is considered to be high.
presets.environment-prod-high: The risk for the production environment is considered to be high.
presets.environment-dev-low: The risk value for the development environment is considered to be low.
presets.dml-in-environment-prod-10k-rows-high: In the production environment, if the number of rows to be updated or deleted exceeds 10000, the risk is considered to be high.
presets.create-database-in-environment-prod-mode: Creating a database in the production environment is considered to be a moderate risk.

algorithm.title: Full mask
algorithm.description: All values will be masked as "******"

bb-default-partial.title: Default Partial
bb-default-partial.description: Default partial type with partial masking

algorithm.title: Range mask
algorithm.description:
Only keep the raw data in the middle, and cover the beginning and end with "**".
For example, "address" will be masked as "**dre**".

FEATURE_GIT_BASED_SCHEMA_VERSION_CONTROL.title: Git-based schema version control
FEATURE_GIT_BASED_SCHEMA_VERSION_CONTROL.desc: Review SQL changes in VCS pull requests with automated checks.

FEATURE_DECLARATIVE_SCHEMA_MIGRATION.title: Declarative schema migration
FEATURE_DECLARATIVE_SCHEMA_MIGRATION.desc: Define desired schema state and let Bytebase handle the migration.

FEATURE_COMPARE_AND_SYNC_SCHEMA.title: Compare and sync schema
FEATURE_COMPARE_AND_SYNC_SCHEMA.desc: Compare schemas between databases and synchronize differences.

FEATURE_ONLINE_SCHEMA_CHANGE.title: Online schema change
FEATURE_ONLINE_SCHEMA_CHANGE.desc: Perform schema changes on large tables with minimal locking.

FEATURE_PRE_DEPLOYMENT_SQL_REVIEW.title: SQL review
FEATURE_PRE_DEPLOYMENT_SQL_REVIEW.desc: Enforce SQL best practices with 100+ lint rules and schema consistency checks.

FEATURE_AUTOMATIC_BACKUP_BEFORE_DATA_CHA.title: Automatic backup
FEATURE_AUTOMATIC_BACKUP_BEFORE_DATA_CHA.desc: Automatically backup data before making changes.

FEATURE_ONE_CLICK_DATA_ROLLBACK.title: One-click data rollback
FEATURE_ONE_CLICK_DATA_ROLLBACK.desc: Quickly rollback data changes with a single click.

FEATURE_MULTI_DATABASE_BATCH_CHANGES.title: Multi-database batch changes
FEATURE_MULTI_DATABASE_BATCH_CHANGES.desc: Apply the same change to multiple databases across different tenants or partitions.

FEATURE_PROGRESSIVE_ENVIRONMENT_DEPLOYME.title: Progressive environment deployment
FEATURE_PROGRESSIVE_ENVIRONMENT_DEPLOYME.desc: Deploy changes progressively through different environments.

FEATURE_SCHEDULED_ROLLOUT_TIME.title: Scheduled rollout time
FEATURE_SCHEDULED_ROLLOUT_TIME.desc: Schedule database changes to run at a specific time.

FEATURE_DATABASE_CHANGELOG.title: Database changelog
FEATURE_DATABASE_CHANGELOG.desc: Track all database schema and data changes.

FEATURE_SCHEMA_DRIFT_DETECTION.title: Schema drift detection
FEATURE_SCHEMA_DRIFT_DETECTION.desc: Detect out-of-band schema changes and report discrepancies.

FEATURE_ROLLOUT_POLICY.title: Rollout policy
FEATURE_ROLLOUT_POLICY.desc: Control whether the schema change task requires manual rolling out.

FEATURE_WEB_BASED_SQL_EDITOR.title: Web-based SQL editor
FEATURE_WEB_BASED_SQL_EDITOR.desc: Execute SQL queries directly from the web interface.

FEATURE_SQL_EDITOR_ADMIN_MODE.title: SQL editor admin mode
FEATURE_SQL_EDITOR_ADMIN_MODE.desc: Access administrative functions in the SQL editor.

FEATURE_NATURAL_LANGUAGE_TO_SQL.title: Natural language to SQL
FEATURE_NATURAL_LANGUAGE_TO_SQL.desc: Convert natural language queries to SQL using AI.

FEATURE_AI_QUERY_EXPLANATION.title: AI query explanation
FEATURE_AI_QUERY_EXPLANATION.desc: Get AI-powered explanations for complex SQL queries.

FEATURE_AI_QUERY_SUGGESTIONS.title: AI query suggestions
FEATURE_AI_QUERY_SUGGESTIONS.desc: Get AI-powered query suggestions and index recommendations.

FEATURE_AUTO_COMPLETE.title: Auto-complete
FEATURE_AUTO_COMPLETE.desc: Intelligent SQL auto-completion in the editor.

FEATURE_SCHEMA_DIAGRAM.title: Schema diagram
FEATURE_SCHEMA_DIAGRAM.desc: Visualize database schema with interactive diagrams.

FEATURE_SCHEMA_EDITOR.title: Schema editor
FEATURE_SCHEMA_EDITOR.desc: Visual schema editing with drag-and-drop interface.

FEATURE_DATA_EXPORT.title: Data export
FEATURE_DATA_EXPORT.desc: Export query results in various formats.

FEATURE_DATA_OFFLINE_EXPORT.title: Data offline export
FEATURE_DATA_OFFLINE_EXPORT.desc: Export data for offline use and analysis.

FEATURE_QUERY_HISTORY.title: Query history
FEATURE_QUERY_HISTORY.desc: Access full query execution history with search capabilities.

FEATURE_SAVED_AND_SHARED_SQL_SCRIPTS.title: Saved and shared SQL scripts
FEATURE_SAVED_AND_SHARED_SQL_SCRIPTS.desc: Save and share SQL scripts with team members.

FEATURE_BATCH_QUERY.title: Batch query
FEATURE_BATCH_QUERY.desc: Execute queries across multiple databases simultaneously.

FEATURE_INSTANCE_READ_ONLY_CONNECTION.title: Read-only connection
FEATURE_INSTANCE_READ_ONLY_CONNECTION.desc: Connect to read replicas for read-only operations.

FEATURE_QUERY_POLICY.title: Query policy
FEATURE_QUERY_POLICY.desc: Configure advanced query restrictions and permissions.

FEATURE_RESTRICT_COPYING_DATA.title: Restrict copying data
FEATURE_RESTRICT_COPYING_DATA.desc: Control user access to copying data from query results.

FEATURE_INSTANCE_SSL_CONNECTION.title: SSL connection
FEATURE_INSTANCE_SSL_CONNECTION.desc: Secure database connections with SSL/TLS encryption.

FEATURE_INSTANCE_CONNECTION_OVER_SSH_TUN.desc: Connect to instances through SSH tunnels for enhanced security.

FEATURE_INSTANCE_CONNECTION_IAM_AUTHENTI.desc: Use cloud provider IAM for database authentication.

FEATURE_CUSTOM_INSTANCE_SYNC_TIME.title: Custom instance sync time
FEATURE_CUSTOM_INSTANCE_SYNC_TIME.desc: Customize database synchronization intervals and settings.

FEATURE_GOOGLE_AND_GITHUB_SSO.desc: Sign in with Google or GitHub accounts.

FEATURE_USER_GROUPS.desc: Organize users into groups for easier management.

FEATURE_DISALLOW_SELF_SERVICE_SIGNUP.title: Disable self-service signup
FEATURE_DISALLOW_SELF_SERVICE_SIGNUP.desc: Require admin invitation for new user registration.

FEATURE_RISK_ASSESSMENT.title: Risk assessment
FEATURE_RISK_ASSESSMENT.desc: Evaluate and categorize the risk level of database changes.

FEATURE_APPROVAL_WORKFLOW.desc: Configure risk levels and approval flows for different tasks.

FEATURE_AUDIT_LOG.title: Audit log
FEATURE_AUDIT_LOG.desc: Track all operations performed by users in the workspace.

FEATURE_ENTERPRISE_SSO.desc: Single sign-on with SAML, OIDC, and OAuth providers.

FEATURE_TWO_FA.desc: Add an extra security layer with authenticator app verification.

FEATURE_PASSWORD_RESTRICTIONS.title: Password restrictions
FEATURE_PASSWORD_RESTRICTIONS.desc: Enforce password complexity and security requirements.

FEATURE_DISALLOW_PASSWORD_SIGNIN.desc: Require SSO authentication only for user signin.

FEATURE_CUSTOM_ROLES.desc: Define custom roles with specific permissions for your organization.

FEATURE_REQUEST_ROLE_WORKFLOW.desc: Users can request project roles with approval workflow.
